name: Wo chu gali Thwo chu gali

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Wo chu galli, thwo chu galli\nMakha twaa yaa galli re
Panbati maiyaa nhyaanaa wagu\nJangli simha yaa kalli re
Panbati maiyaa nhyaanaa wagu\nJangli simha yaa kalli re

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Gaacha jula pancha rangi\n…Dhaachan changu gulli re
Swo lisein swe magaa\n..Gulli cha nakkali re !
Swo lisein swe magaa\n..Gulli cha nakkali re !

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Swothein maswothein chonka\nSwoyaa chonigu baani re
Gathe yaanaa lomanke\n..Khane wo nhilegu re
Gathe yaanaa lomanke\n..Khane wo nhilegu re

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Wo chu galli, thwo chu galli\nMakha twaa yaa galli re
Panbati maiyaa nhyaanaa wagu\nJangli simha yaa kalli re

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Mohani yaa thein chalaa\n…Musu musu nhila re
Ghha byeku chyaanaa wala\nJobana boyaa re
Ghha byeku chyaanaa wala\nJobana boyaa re

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Kele hanaa mikhaa cha\nChu ya, chu ya masyu re
Suu khanaa magyaa ma ji\nCha khanaa gyaata re
Suu khanaa magyaa ma ji\nCha khanaa gyaata re

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Wo chu galli, thwo chu galli\nMakha twaa yaa galli re
[ Panbati maiyaa nhyaanaa wagu\nJangli simha yaa kalli re ] – 2\n
